A

add(int, MemBlock) - Method in class MMS.List
Adds a new node to this list, as follows: Creates a new node containing the given memory block, and inserts the node at the given index in this list.
addFirst(MemBlock) - Method in class MMS.List
Adds the given memory block at the beginning of this list.
addLast(MemBlock) - Method in class MMS.List
Adds the given memory block to the end of this list.

C

current - Variable in class MMS.ListIterator
 

D

defrag() - Method in class MMS.MemorySpace
Performs a defragmantation of the memory space.

E

equals(MemBlock) - Method in class MMS.MemBlock
Checks if this memory block has the same base address and length as the other memory block

F

free(int) - Method in class MMS.MemorySpace
Frees the memory block whose base address equals the given address

G

getBlock(int) - Method in class MMS.List
Gets the memory block located at the given index in this list.
getNode(int) - Method in class MMS.List
Gets the node located at the given index in this list.

H

hasNext() - Method in class MMS.ListIterator
Checks if this iterator has more elements to process

I

indexOf(MemBlock) - Method in class MMS.List
Gets the index of the node containing the given memory block.
iterator() - Method in class MMS.List
Returns an iterator over this list, starting with the first element.

L

List - Class in MMS
Represents a list of Nodes.
List() - Constructor for class MMS.List
Constructs a new list of Node objects, each holding a memory block (MemBlock object)
ListIterator - Class in MMS
Represents an iterator of a linked list of memory blocks.
ListIterator(Node) - Constructor for class MMS.ListIterator
Constructs a list iterator, starting at the given node

M

malloc(int) - Method in class MMS.MemorySpace
Allocates a memory block.
MemBlock - Class in MMS
Represents a memory block.
MemBlock(int, int) - Constructor for class MMS.MemBlock
Constructs a memory block with the given base address and length
MemorySpace - Class in MMS
Represents a managed memory space (also called "heap").
MemorySpace(int) - Constructor for class MMS.MemorySpace
Constructs a managed memory space ("heap") of a given maximal size.
MMS - package MMS
 

N

next() - Method in class MMS.ListIterator
Returns the next memory block in the list, and advances the cursor position.
Node - Class in MMS
Represents a node in a list of memory blocks.
Node(MemBlock) - Constructor for class MMS.Node
Constructs a new node containing a memory block.

R

remove(MemBlock) - Method in class MMS.List
Removes the given memory block from this list.
removeFirst() - Method in class MMS.List
Removes the first memory block from this list.

T

A textual representation of this list.

A textual representation of this memory block object, useful for debugging
toString() - Method in class MMS.MemorySpace
A textual representation of this memory space
toString() - Method in class MMS.Node
A textual representation of this node, useful for debugging.
